greeting.title:
Siyun
 & 
Konstantin
greeting.message:
The love of a man and a woman, born thousands of miles apart, has united Korea and Russia.
Together, we have found the meaning of true love and we are delighted to invite you to share in this joyous occasion.
Your presence would mean the world to us.

mapInfo.address2:
223 Samyang-ro 173-gil, Gangbuk-gu, Seoul
Exit 2 of the Bukhansan-Ui Station.
The shuttle bus runs every 10 minutes from 4PM to 10PM.

locationInfo.title: Access
locationInfo.desc:
Exit 2 of the Bukhansan-Ui Station
The shuttle bus runs every 10 minutes from 4PM to 10PM.

information.message1: Arrive early to sip on a welcome beverage and drink in the stunning fall foliage at Sunwoongak.
information.message2: Witness our union and share in our joy.
information.message3: Indulge in a buffet of Western and Korean delights, accompanied by a selection of drinks.
information.message4: Join us on the dancefloor, where a DJ will be spinning tunes until 10pm. Feel free to depart after dinner if needed.
